name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice, add rum, top with soda water, and garnish with mint.

name: Pina Colada
instructions: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth. Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled glass, and garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Margarita
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a salt-rimmed glass.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Muddle sugar and bitters, add bourbon and stir with ice. Garnish with orange peel.
